title: ENG-423457: Expected policy is not getting applied.
custom_steps:
1. Create AWS S3 App Instance Policy, Upload activity with File should not match with types Text, Select DLP Profile action Block and If none of the specified profiles matches to Alert 
2. Create AWS S3 App Instance Policy, Upload activity with File should match with >1B size, traffic action as block
3. Create AWS S3 App Instance Policy, Upload activity and traffic action as Alert
4. Upload text file greater than 1B to AWS s3
custom_expected: Upload AWS S3 should be blocked by Policy 2
